00027 #include "kvi_settings.h"
00028 #include "kvi_kvs_popupmenu.h"
00029 
00030 class KVIRC_API KviKvsPopupManager
00031 {
00032 protected: // can only be created by init/done
00033         KviKvsPopupManager();
00034         ~KviKvsPopupManager();
00035 protected:
00036         KviPointerHashTable<QString,KviKvsPopupMenu>    * m_pPopupDict;
00037         static KviKvsPopupManager * m_pInstance;
00038 public:
00039         static KviKvsPopupManager * instance(){ return m_pInstance; };
00040         static void init();
00041         static void done();
00042         int popupCount(){ return m_pPopupDict->count(); };
00043 
00044         KviPointerHashTable<QString,KviKvsPopupMenu> * popupDict(){ return m_pPopupDict; };
00045 
00046         KviKvsPopupMenu * lookup(const QString &szPopupName){ return m_pPopupDict->find(szPopupName); };
00047         KviKvsPopupMenu * get(const QString &szPopupName);
00048         void add(const QString &szPopupName,KviKvsPopupMenu * pPopup){ m_pPopupDict->replace(szPopupName,pPopup); };
00049         void remove(const QString &szPopupName){ m_pPopupDict->remove(szPopupName); };
00050         void clear(){ m_pPopupDict->clear(); };
00051 
00052         void save(const QString & filename);
00053         void load(const QString & filename);
00054 };
00055
